languages.text: "Ты с Глейто справился бы и сам. Честно говоря, мне кажется, этот пес и в одиночку бы судно захватил".
"You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I do believe that dog could have captured the ship all on its own."
languages.original_text: "Ты с Глейто справился бы и сам. Честно говоря, мне кажется, этот пес и в одиночку бы судно захватил".

traits.locale_text: "You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I think that dog could have captured the ship on its own."
"You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I think that dog could have captured the ship on its own."
"You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I do believe that dog could have captured the ship all on its own."

languages.text: «Glaito y usted lo habrían conseguido sin mi ayuda. De hecho, estoy bastante segur{mf|o|a} de que el perro podría haber capturado la nave en solitario».
languages.original_text: "You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I do believe that dog could have captured the ship all on its own."

traits.locale_text: «Glaito y usted lo habrían conseguido sin mi ayuda. De hecho, estoy bastante segur{mf|o|a} de que el perro podría haber capturado la nave en solitario».

languages.text: “就算不用我帮忙，你和格雷托也完全没问题。说真的，我甚至觉得光靠那条狗就够了。”
languages.original_text: "You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I do believe that dog could have captured the ship all on its own."

traits.locale_text: “就算不用我帮忙，你和格雷托也完全没问题。说真的，我甚至觉得光靠那条狗就够了。”

languages.text: « Glaito et vous auriez réussi même sans mon aide. Pour ne rien vous cacher, je suis {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que ce chien aurait pu s'emparer du vaisseau à lui seul. »
languages.original_text: "You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I do believe that dog could have captured the ship all on its own."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito et vous auriez réussi même sans mon aide. Pour ne rien vous cacher, je suis {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que ce chien aurait pu s'emparer du vaisseau à lui seul. »

languages.text: 「君とグライトは{mf|俺|私}の助けがなくてもなんとかやっていけるだろう。実際、犬だけでも船全体を捕らえることもできただろうと思う」
languages.original_text: "You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I do believe that dog could have captured the ship all on its own."

traits.locale_text: 「君とグライトは{mf|俺|私}の助けがなくてもなんとかやっていけるだろう。実際、犬だけでも船全体を捕らえることもできただろうと思う」

languages.text: "Sen ve Glaito, yardımım olmadan gayet iyiydiniz. Hatta bana kalırsa bıraksak köpek, bir başına koca gemiyi ele geçirebilirdi."
languages.original_text: "You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I do believe that dog could have captured the ship all on its own."

traits.locale_text: "Sen ve Glaito, yardımım olmadan gayet iyiydiniz. Hatta bana kalırsa bıraksak köpek, bir başına koca gemiyi ele geçirebilirdi."

languages.text: "Ihr und Glaito hättet das auch ohne meine Hilfe geschafft. Ehrlich gesagt glaube ich, dieser Hund hätte das Schiff auch alleine kapern können."
languages.original_text: "You and Glaito would have managed without my help. Actually, I do believe that dog could have captured the ship all on its own."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr und Glaito hättet das auch ohne meine Hilfe geschafft. Ehrlich gesagt glaube ich, dieser Hund hätte das Schiff auch alleine kapern können."
